title: Sweet potato and leek soup

default: 290ml/10fl oz/½ pint chicken stock (vegetarians may substitute with vegetable stock)

steps: Place spinach, stock, sweet potato and leeks in a saucepan. Bring to the boil, reduce the heat and simmer for eight minutes.
Place the cooked ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth.
Stir in the double cream and serve in a large bowl.
